A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Yeah\, it’s that bad. It’s infuriating to even talk about\, watching your favorite franchise be destroyed by two people. Kathleen Kennedy and Rian Johnson. The Last Jedi is not Star Wars. As a fan my entire life\, I was confused\, bored\, really confused\, really bored\, frustrated\, and pissed off the entire movie. Just don’t watch it\, and don’t go see the new movies. Rating: 2/5 24%
